```{r data}
data<- read.csv (here::here("data_assignment1.csv"))
data$Date<- mdy(data$Date)

Year <- data%>%
  group_by(year)%>%
  summarize(tmax_c = mean(tmax_c),
            tmin_c = mean(tmin_c),
            precip = sum(precip), 
            no_months=length(unique(month))) #first and last month dont have full 12 months
```
